Text:
Not as profound as Star Trek II, nor as charming as Star Trek IV and not as epic as First Contact, still this one is very funny and action packed and a nice farewell to the original crew.

Although, Klingon blood is RED, not milky pink!
this is bullshit ... there are two sounds from two guys talking non stop and giving comments all the time. Dont download this!!!!!
tsrejca...That is what a Rifftrax IS!!! Please don't be pissed because you did not realize what you were getting!
